frame.name: Getting_underway
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Self_mover</fen> begins the motion away from a relatively deprofiled <fen>Source</fen> location. The focus is on the motion rather than on the location that is being departed. The label <fen>Self_mover</fen> here also includes vehicles that are steered by an intentional agent.
<ex><fex name="Time">After a lunch of sandwiches on paper plates</fex>, <fex name="sel">we</fex> <t>get</t> <t>under</t> <t>way</t>.</ex>
<ex>When <fex name="Self_mover">I</fex> <t>got</t> <t>going</t> <fex name="dur">for the day</fex> I had horrible pain down my buttocks and leg.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Self_mover">We</fex> <t>got</t> <t>going</t> <fex name="Path">via Tikul</fex> and after a light lunch finally found the pottery place recommended in the guide,</ex>
<ex>I'll make this brief, as <fex name="Self_mover">I</fex> need to <t>head</t> <t>out</t> <fex name="Goal">for the bookstore</fex> <fex name="Time">in a bit</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Self_mover">The band "Killers"</fex> is <t>heading</t> <t>out</t> <fex name="Journey">on 25-date tour through Europe and Japan</fex> <fex name="Time">this week</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Self_mover
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Self_mover</fen> is the volitional agent that moves.
<ex><fex name="Self_mover">Tom and I</fex> <t>got</t> <t>under</t> <t>way</t> in the wee hours of the morning, planning to get to the confluence area between the onsets of nautical and civil twilight.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Source
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Source</fen> refers to the starting-point of the <fen>Self_mover</fen>'s motion.
<ex> The vessel <t>got</t> <t>under</t> <t>way</t> <fex name="Source">from San Francisco</fex> on 14 June and completed two round-trips to Manila before the cessation of hostilies.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Path
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Path</fen> is any description of the <fen>Self_mover</fen>'s trajectory of motion which is neither a <fen>Source</fen> nor a <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex>We can <t>get</t> <t>going</t> <fex name="Path">via Fife</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Goal</fen> is any expression that tells where the <fen>Self_mover</fen> ends up, or would end up, as a result of the motion.
<ex>On the 17th, the vessel <t>got</t> <t>under</t> <t>way</t> <fex name="Goal">for Tarawa, Gilbert Islands</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Manner</fen> expression describes a property of motion which is not directly related to the trajectory of motion. Descriptions of speed, steadiness, grace, means of motion, and other things count as <fen>Manner</fen> expressions.
<ex>She slipped the Dyna-Cruiser into gear and we <fex name="Manner">slowly</fex> <t>headed</t> <t>out</t> for a drive.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which a <fen>Self_mover</fen> begins the motion.
<ex>We <t>get</t> <t>under</t> <t>way</t> <fex name="Mns">by heading up through the alpine meadows of la Balme 2140m and then past some sparse pine forests</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Self_mover</fen> begins the motion away from the <fen>Source</fen>.
<ex>We <t>got</t> <t>going</t> <fex name="Time">at 5 am</fex> in the rain, just to make the massive hike to Davenport Gap.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Depictive</fen> is a phrase which describes the state of the <fen>Self_mover</fen> when she begins the motion away from the <fen>Source</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration_of_final_state
FE.definition: <def-root>The length of time of the <fen>Self_mover</fen>'s absence from the Source.</def-root>

FE.name: Mode_of_transportation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Mode_of_transportation</fen> is the transportation device that a human <fen>Self_mover</fen> uses to travel.
<ex>The traffic, when we finally <t>got</t> <t>going</t> <fex name="mot">in Jamaorn's car</fex>, was appalling.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Journey
FE.definition:
<def-root>The journey is the trip or expedition on which the <fen>Self_mover</fen> embarks.
<ex>I'm <t>heading</t> <t>out</t> <fex name="Journey">on a mission</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Direction
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Direction</fen> in which the <fen>Self_mover</fen> begins to move.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: get under way.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: start motion and make progress towards a goal

lexUnit.name: get going.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: begin motion away from a location

lexUnit.name: head out.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to begin motion away from a location

lexUnit.name: hit the road.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: set out on a journey
